TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Padrangigrang, title = Padrangigrang, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Padrangigrang} }

S.FORM: alang Padrangigrang ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Tayimari go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 108 buwan, 318 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 96% kyan ku 304 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 4% kyan ku 14 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Paywan 92%, Bunun 2%, Amis 1%, Tayan 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkyahu' na Padrangigrang hya' ga Calavi. tay 'llaw na Padrangigrang hya' ga Cilalongay. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Padrangigrang ga ungat pqwasan biru. spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh hmgiru lmosay ulay cyux ki'an ulay qu qalang. ulay qu wahan mima' ru mangay llpyung minkahul twahiq. ulay qu wahan mima' ru mangay llpyung minkahul twahiq. tuqi qsya' ki rrhzyal 'llaw balay ktan qu qalang myan. baqun tmnga' kwara' rgryax nya'. tuqi 'san ungat kisya' nya'. "tuqi'" qu spzyang glgang nha qalang musa' ana inu'.

alang Padrangigrang ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Tayimari go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 108 bowan, 318 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 96% kyan ko 304 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 4% kyan ko 14 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Paywan 92%, Bonon 2%, Amis 1%, Tayan 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkyaho' na Padrangigrang hya' ga Calavi. tay 'llaw na Padrangigrang hya' ga Cilalongay. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Padrangigrang ga ongat pqwasan biro. spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh hmgiro lmosay olay cyox ki'an olay qo qalang. olay qo wahan mima' ro mangay llpyong minkahol twahiq. olay qo wahan mima' ro mangay llpyong minkahol twahiq. toqi qsya' ki rrhzyal 'llaw balay ktan qo qalang myan. baqon tmnga' kwara' rgryax nya'. toqi 'san ongat kisya' nya'. "toqi'" qo spzyang glgang nha qalang mosa' ana ino'.
